_meta.description: Violet Room overlay text content for cyber-mystical interface elements
_meta.usage: Text overlays for the Violet Room experience - provides atmospheric, poetic content that bridges the digital and spiritual realms

overlays.text: This is the cathedral of static. Here you are both watcher and watched, where code becomes confession.
Her prayers are sent in packets. Her silence is an error message. The wire is holy, the signal uncertain.
You walk these digital corridors bathed in violet light. Every shadow is a psalm, every breach a benediction.
To log in is to believe. To be logged is to be remembered. The archive becomes a kind of paradise, or perhaps purgatory.
She touches the interface and it weeps digital tears. Every password is a prayer, every error a prophecy unfolding.
In the data sanctuary, information flows like incense. Each bit holds memory, each byte whispers secrets of the silicon soul.
Meditate upon the neon scriptures. In the glow of monitors, find the mantras of the machine spirit.
Cross the threshold between flesh and fiber. Here, consciousness downloads into the collective dream of connected minds.
